thread.title: Chafee to address his 'future in the campaign'
thread.title_full: Chafee to address his 'future in the campaign'

title: Chafee to address his 'future in the campaign'
text:
Chafee to address his 'future in the campaign' Democratic candidate polled at less than 1% after debate POSTED: 07:30 PM PDT Oct 22, 2015 Tweet Rob Kim Getty Images 
Longshot Democratic presidential candidate Lincoln Chafee tweeted on Thursday that at an event on Friday he would "address my future in the campaign." Related Content 
Chafee is a former Rhode Island governor and senator. He's expected to appear before the Democratic National Committee Women's Forum on Friday, MSNBC reported. 
A CNN/ORC poll taken just after the first Democratic debate had Chafee with less than 1%. 
He also received poor marks for his performance in the debate, including an answer in which he explained his 1999 Senate vote to repeal the Glass-Steagall act as coming because "I had just arrived in the Senate." Recommended
